amendment.description: Amendment sought to replace the electricity provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 108-69 to delete the bill's electricity deregulation provisions and to insert in lieu thereof provisions to increase consumer and investor protections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 237 (Roll no. 133).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Dingell.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 237 (Roll no. 133).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
